text: Staging in general is  a topic we're thinking a lot about. We know our staging needs a revamp. But need to nail <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> before diving into staging. :slightly_smiling_face:

:wave: <@ULK0W5DLY> Hope everything is going well. Welcome to HubSpot developer community - we're excited to have you :bmo:

If you  haven't seen it, I'd suggest checking out <https://designers.HubSpot.com/discoverykit>

and <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/cms-for-developers>

If you're looking for a really quick start... you could explore a marketplace template to install and use: <http://marketplace.HubSpot.com>

If you're a developer - you may also want to setup <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> :slightly_smiling_face:
Welcome to our community <@ULGQ03PT9> - we're really excited to have you!! :grinning::bmo: Let  us know if you have any questions about getting going on HubSpot CMS :slightly_smiling_face:

Welcome <@ULEBKQGLC> :wave: We're really excited to have you a part of our HubSpot Developer Community! :bmo:

How is your HubSpot development experience going so far?
Hi <@ULEGHSZS9> - welcome to the party :sprocket: :tada: We're really excited to have you a part of our community!
Hi <@UKZ9JVAUE> - This would be a good question to repost in <#CFPRTEGTX|modules> :slightly_smiling_face: Probably get better visibility than in the welcome channel
